text: Marciano Magnani (born 14 June 1936) is an Italian wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman middleweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Italy Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bologna
title: Marciano Magnani
